SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Models

Class Waitlist

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Models.Waitlist
public class Waitlist extends Object
This class manages participant lists for a given event, including waiting, selected, cancelled, and confirmed entrants. This class provides methods to move entrants between these lists.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Waitlist

      public Waitlist(Event event)
      Constructs a Waitlist manager for a specific event. The waiting, selected, cancelled and confirmed lists are initialized based on the event's existing attendee lists. If any list is null, it will be initialized as an empty ArrayList and set back on the event.
      Parameters:
      event - The event whose participant lists are being managed.

    • Waitlist

      public Waitlist(Event event, NotificationService notificationService)
      Constructs a Waitlist manager for a specific event, using a custom NotificationService. This is useful for testing so that notifications can be mocked. The waiting, selected, cancelled, and confirmed lists are initialized based on the event's existing attendee lists. If any list is null, it will be initialized as an empty ArrayList and set back on the event.
      Parameters:
      event - The event whose participant lists are being managed.
      notificationService - The NotificationService to use for sending notifications

  • Method Details

    • addEntrantToWaitlist

      public void addEntrantToWaitlist(String entrantId)
      Adds an entrant to the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The unique ID of the entrant to be added to the waiting list

    • moveToSelected

      public void moveToSelected(String entrantId)
      Moves an entrant from waiting list to selected list and sends a notification.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The unique ID of the entrant

    • moveToCancelled

      public void moveToCancelled(String entrantId)
      Moves an entrant from selected list to cancelled list and sends a notification.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The unique ID of the entrant

    • addToConfirmed

      public void addToConfirmed(String entrantId)
      Adds an entrant to the confirmed list and sends a notification.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The unique ID of the entrant

    • getWaitingList

      public List<String> getWaitingList()
      Getter method for waitingList
      Returns:
      The list of entrant IDs currently on the waiting list for an event.

    • getSelectedList

      The list of entrant IDs currently on the selected list for an event.
